task: SCAFFOLD a simple Tasks frontend UI

plannerResult.raw_task: SCAFFOLD a simple Tasks frontend UI

subtasks.name: agent-ui-shell
subtasks.objective: Create the base app entry and layout scaffold for the Tasks app, including root container, title/header, and high-level page structure.

subtasks.name: agent-task-list-ui
subtasks.objective: Build reusable components for task rows, task list rendering, and simple add/edit/delete controls with lightweight interactions.

subtasks.name: agent-task-state
subtasks.objective: Define initial in-memory task model/schema and local state management for creating, toggling, and removing tasks.

subtasks.name: agent-task-style
subtasks.objective: Create minimal styling for readable layout, spacing, buttons, and task states (e.g., pending/completed), plus responsive behavior.
